author: ozeigermann
msg: You can now configure whether the TM commits / rolls
back the transaction or if this has to be done by the store. Default is
the store does it as this is the way Slide's TM handles it. This is needed to
make it work with external TMs like the the one from JBoss

author: ozeigermann
msg: Replaced characters offending filenames of tx file store to make it work with JBoss' TM.

author: ozeigermann
msg: Added correct caching and removal of Links.

author: ozeigermann
msg: Bug: The hashcode for the Uri object is calculated once by a call to parseUri() and
stored in a field called "pk".  Unfortunately the "parseUri" method takes a
String parameter called "uri", which somtimes differs from the String field
called "uri"; the difference is a trailing slash.  The breaks the
relationship between equals and hashcode, since two instances can now be
equal but have different hash codes.
Fix: Take the internally stored - not the parameter - uri to generate pk

author: ib
msg: Fix principal in ACE: DAV:owner is a child element of DAV:property
